title: Peanut butter chicken thighs with caramelised nuts and steamed rice
description: Satay-style chicken pieces served with spicy, sweet roasted almonds and cashew nuts.
ingredients: 800g/1lb 12oz boneless, skinless, chicken thighs, cut into 2.5cm cubes
1 tbsp Chinese black rice vinegar, or good-quality balsamic vinegar
1 tsp Sichuan peppercorns, toasted then ground
6 spring onions, white and green parts separated, thinly sliced
5cm/2in piece fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped or grated
